description: Provides scheduled Auto-Tune action details for the Elasticsearch domain, such as Auto-Tune action type, description, severity, and scheduled date.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: Specifies the domain name for which you want Auto-Tune action details.

nested_items.name: AutoTunes
nested_items.description: Specifies the list of setting adjustments that Auto-Tune has made to the domain. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_items.name: AutoTuneType
nested_items.description: Specifies Auto-Tune type. Valid value is SCHEDULED_ACTION.

nested_items.name: AutoTuneDetails
nested_items.description: Specifies details of the Auto-Tune action. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_items.name: ScheduledAutoTuneDetails
nested_items.description: Specifies details of the scheduled Auto-Tune action. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_items.name: Date
nested_items.description: Specifies timestamp for the Auto-Tune action scheduled for the domain.

nested_items.name: ActionType
nested_items.description: Specifies Auto-Tune action type. Valid values are JVM_HEAP_SIZE_TUNING and JVM_YOUNG_GEN_TUNING.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: Specifies Auto-Tune action severity. Valid values are LOW, MEDIUM and HIGH.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: Specifies an identifier to allow retrieval of paginated results.
